nodes.bodyText:
We will need a better handling of exceptions.

Evaluate whether or not we will need to log information for the caught exception.
If logging is an option, we will like to include useful information in the message (in this case, subnet id etc.)
If not, we could combine exceptions in one line, for example,

catch(ParameterNullOrEmptyException | HavePortInSubnet e)
{
...
}
I checked the code and found that it was not good to log the info, so I combined exceptions in one line.
